description: Fix TypeScript errors in students/patients management components

workstreams.description: Analyze TypeScript errors in students directory
workstreams.findings: 196 TypeScript errors found - mainly null safety, missing exports, and type mismatches

workstreams.description: Fix TypeScript errors in all components
Validate fixes and measure error reduction

decisions.decision: Use existing comprehensive types from student.types.ts and align actions.ts
Export getStudent as both getStudent and getStudentById for compatibility
Fix all event handlers with explicit React.ChangeEvent types
